chapter.title: GridSphere UI Visual Bean Library
chapter.para: GridSphere UI tags are JSP tags that can be used in a JSP page to create user interfaces. The UI tag library descriptor which defines tag parameters and definitions can be found in webapps/gridsphere/WEB-INF/tlds/portletui.tld of the source directory. All tags may contain a beanId attribute. The valueof beanId is a String that identifies the tag so it mey be retrieved as a visual bean in the portlet. See the Tutorial for an example.

sect1.title: Usage on GridSphere UI Visual Beans
sect1.para: Every JSP that wishes to use the tag library must include the following code snippet show below:

example.title: Usage of visual beans
example.screen: <%@ taglib uri="/portletUI" prefix="ui" %> <%@ taglib uri="/portletAPI" prefix="portletAPI" %> <portletAPI:init/>
example.para: Now the tags can be used within a JSP by using the "ui" reference specified in the taglib directive. The portletAPI directive and tag initialization make the portlet objects available to the tags.
